products.name: Bonjela Adult Mouth Ulcer Pain Relief Sugar Free Gel 15g
products.howToUse: For Adults and children over the age of 16 years only: Mouth Ulcers & Sores - Massage approximately one centimetre (half an inch) of Bonjela onto the sore area. This can be repeated after 3 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Denture Sores - Massage approximately one centimetre of Bonjela onto the sore area, and leave at least 30 minutes before reinserting dentures. Do not apply Bonjela directly onto the dentures.
products.howToUseThree: If you miss a dose, just apply a new dose and follow the instructions as before

products.name: Bonjela Adult Mouth Ulcer Pain Relief Cool Mint Gel 15g
products.howToUse: For Adults and children over the age of 16 years only: Mouth Ulcers & Sores - Massage approximately one centimetre (half an inch) of Bonjela onto the sore area. This can be repeated after 3 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Denture Sores - Massage approximately one centimetre of Bonjela onto the sore area, and leave at least 30 minutes before reinserting dentures. Do not apply Bonjela directly onto the dentures.
products.howToUseThree: If you miss a dose, just apply a new dose and follow the instructions as before

products.name: Bonjela Junior Gel - 15g
products.howToUse: For adults, the elderly and children over 5 months: Apply a little gel to the painful or sore area with either a clean finger tip or swab. This may be repeated after 20 minutes and then every three hours.
products.howToUseTwo: If you miss a dose, just apply a new dose and follow the instructions as before

products.name: Bonjela Infant Soothing Sugar Free Teething Gel - 15g
products.howToUse: For adults, the elderly and children over 5 months: Apply a little gel to the painful or sore area with either a clean finger tip or swab. This may be repeated after 20 minutes and then every three hours.
products.howToUseTwo: If you miss a dose, just apply a new dose and follow the instructions as before

products.name: Gaviscon Original Aniseed Relief Oral Suspension - 600ml
products.howToUse: Adults and children 12 years and over: Take 10-20ml (two to four 5ml spoonfuls) after meals and at bedtime, up to four times a day. Shake well before use.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 12 years: Should be given only on medical advice.
products.howToUseThree: If you take too much of this product you may feel bloated and experience some abdominal discomfort.

products.name: Gaviscon Advance Heartburn & Indigestion Liquid Peppermint 300ml
products.howToUse: Adults including the elderly and children 12 years and over: 5-10 ml (one to two 5ml spoonfuls) after meals and at bedtime. Shake well before use.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 12 years: Should only be taken on medical advice
products.howToUseThree: If you forget a dose it is not necessary to double the dose next time, just carry on taking as before. If you take too much of this product you may feel bloated and experience some abdominal discomfort.

products.name: Gaviscon Double Action Liquid Heartburn & Indigestion Relief Mint Flavour 600ml
products.howToUse: Adults and children 12 years and over: Take 10-20ml (one to four 5ml spoonfuls) after meals and at bedtime, up to four times a day, or as directed by your doctor. Shake well before use.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 12 years: Should only be taken on medical advice
products.howToUseThree: If you take too much of this product you may feel bloated.

products.name: Gaviscon Heartburn & Indigestion Relief Peppermint Flavour Tablets x48
products.howToUse: Adults and children 12 years and over: when symptoms occur, take two to four tablets after meals and at bedtime. Chew thoroughhly before swallowing.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 12 years: Should only be taken on medical advice
products.howToUseThree: If you forget a dose it is not necessary to double the dose next time, just carry on taking as before. If you take too much of this product you may feel bloated.

products.name: Gaviscon Double Action Heartburn & Indigestion Mint Flavour Tablets x24
products.howToUse: Adults and children 12 years and over: when symptoms occur, take two to four tablets after meals and at bedtime, up to four times a day. Chew thoroughhly before swallowing.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 12 years: Should only be taken on medical advice
products.howToUseThree: If you forget a dose it is not necessary to double the dose next time, just carry on taking as before. If you take too much of this product you may feel bloated.

products.name: Nurofen Long Lasting 300mg Prolonged Release Capsules x24
products.howToUse: Adults and children over 12 years: Initial dose 2 capsules taken with water and swallowed whole, then, if necessary, 1 or 2 capsules after at least 8 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Do not give to children under 12 years.
products.howToUseThree: Do not chew of suck the capsules. Do not exceed more than 4 capsules in 24 hours. Do not exceed the stated dose.

products.name: Nurofen Day & Night Cold & Flu 200mg/5mg - 16 Tablets
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly and children over 12 years: Take 2 tablets every 8 hours. Leave at least 4 hours between doeses and do not exceed 6 tablets in any 24 hour period.
products.howToUseTwo: Do not give to children under 12 years.
products.howToUseThree: This medicine is for short-term use only. Take the lowest dose for the shortest time necessary. Do not take Nurofen Day & Night Cold & Flu for longer than 10 days

products.name: Nurofen Express 200mg Liquid Capsules Ibuprofen x16
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly and children & adolescents between 12 and 18 years:Take 1 or 2 capsules with water, up to three times a day as required. Leave at least four hours between doses. Do not take more than 6 capsules in 24 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Do not give to children under 12 years.
products.howToUseThree: This product is for short-term use only. You should take the lowest dose for the shortest time necessary to relieve your symptoms.

products.name: Nurofen Express 400mg Liquid Capsules Ibuprofen x20
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly and childrem ages 12 years and older: Take 1 capsule with water, up to three times a day as required. Leave at least four hours betwene doses. Do not take more than 3 capsules in 24 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Do not give to children under 12 years.
products.howToUseThree: This product is for short-term use only. You should take the lowest dose for the shortest time necessary to relieve your symptoms.

products.name: Nurofen 200mg Caplets - 16 Caplets
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly and children & adolescents between 12 and 18 years: Take 1 or 2 tablets with water, up to three times a day as required. Leave at least four hours between doses. Do not take more than 6 tavlets in 24 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Do not give to children under 12 years.
products.howToUseThree: This product is for short-term use only. You should take the lowest dose for the shortest time necessary to relieve your symptoms.

products.name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu - Blackcurrant - 10 Sachets
products.howToUse: Adults and children aged 16 or over: Dissolve one sachet in a mug of hot but not boiling water. Stir until dissolved. If preferred, sweeten to taste with sugar, honey or your usual sweetener. It is impotantant to drink plenty of fluids when suffering from Colds & Flu.
products.howToUseTwo: One sachet every 4-6 hours as required. Do not take more than 4 sachets within 24 hours.

products.name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu - Honey & Ginger - 10 Sachets
products.howToUse: Adults and children aged 16 or over: Dissolve one sachet in a mug of hot but not boiling water. Stir until dissolved. If preferred, sweeten to taste with sugar, honey or your usual sweetener. It is impotantant to drink plenty of fluids when suffering from Colds & Flu.
products.howToUseTwo: One sachet every 4-6 hours as required. Do not take more than 4 sachets within 24 hours.

products.name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu - All in One - 16 Capsules
products.howToUse: Adults and children aged 16 or over: The capsules should be swallowed whole with water. Do not chew. It is important to drink plenty of fluids when suffering from colds and flu.

products.name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu - 16 Capsules
products.howToUse: Adults and children aged 16 or over: The capsules should be swallowed whole with water. Do not chew. It is important to drink plenty of fluids when suffering from colds and flu.

products.name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu - Day & Night - 16 Capsules
products.howToUse: Adults and children aged 16 or over: The capsules should be swallowed whole with water. Do not chew. It is important to drink plenty of fluids when suffering from colds and flu.

products.name: Optrex Hayfever Relief drops - 10ml
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly, and children over 6 years: One or two drops to be administered into each eye four-times daily.
products.howToUseTwo: Children under 6 years: This medicine should not be used in children under 6 years of age.

products.name: Optrex Bloodshot Eye Drops Irritation Redness Relief - 10ml
products.howToUse: Adults and children over 12 years: Gently squeeze one or two drops into each eye. Repeat as necessary. Do not use more than four times in 24 hours.
products.howToUseTwo: Continued use may increase redness of the eye. Do not use the medicine if it changes colour or becomes cloudy.

products.name: Optrex Allergy 2% w/v Eye Drops - 10ml
products.howToUse: Adults and children over 12 years: Gently squeeze one or two drops inside the lower lid without touching your eye, close your eye, and wipe away any excess liquid from the eyes with a clean tissue. Repeat for other eye if necessary.
products.howToUseTwo: If symptoms worsen or do not improve, talk to your doctor or pharmacist.

products.name: Optrex Bacterial Conjunctivitis 1% w/w Eye Ointment
products.howToUse: Adults, the elderly, and children over 2 years: Place the nozzle of the tube close to your eye, ensuring it does not touch your eye (use a mirror if this will help you), gently pull lower eyelid downwards, look up, and gently squeeze the tube to apply 1cm of the ointment to the space between the lower eyelid and the eye. Repeat with other eye if necessary.
products.howToUseTwo: It is recommeneded that any child below the age of two years with an eye infection should be seen by a doctor.
products.howToUseThree: See Patient Information Leaflet for full instructions on how to use this product.

products.name: Optrex Sore Eye Drops Irritation Relief Soothe & Cleanse - 10ml
products.howToUse: Adults and children over 12 years: Gently squeeze bottle and let 1 drop fall into the space between the lower eyelid and the eye, ensuring the nozzle does not touch your eye, the skin around your eye, or your fingers.
products.howToUseTwo: See Patient Information Leaflet for full instructions on how to use this product.

Strepsils Honey & Lemon Lozenges for sore throat x36
Strepsils Strawberry Sugar Free Lozenges - 36 pack
Strepsils Sore Throat Pain Relief Honey & Lemon Flavour - 24 lozenges
